text: Aey Nabi, jab tumlog auraton ko talaq do to unhein unki iddat (waiting-period) ke liye talaq diya karo aur iddat ke zamane ka theek theek shumar karo, aur Allah se daro jo tumhara Rubb hai (zamana-e-iddat mein) na tum unhein unke gharon se nikalo aur na woh khud nikle, illa yeh ke woh kisi sareeh burayi ki murtakib ho(manifestly evil deed). Yeh Allah ki muqarrar karda hadein hain, aur jo koi Allah ki hadon (bounds/limits) se tajauz karega woh apne upar khud zulm karega. Tum nahin jaante shayad iske baad Allah (muwafikat/reconciliation ki) koi surat paida karde
